full_text: RT @disclosetv: JUST IN - Canada: Alberta to scrap vaccine passport program at midnight tonight, Premier Jason Kenney announces.

localize.full_text: RT @disclosetv: JUST IN - 加拿大。艾伯塔省省长Jason Kenney宣布，艾伯塔省将在今晚午夜取消疫苗护照计划。
